title: Cancer Club LF Dedicated Active players to Join our team!
body:
Hey Guys 

Cancer Club LF Dedicated Players To join our team who are dedicated and active!!! and willing to play with the team alot. we planning setting up scrims and also hopefully future tournaments !!, WE looking for players to represent the team and want to improve there game play. we are a club also that host flexing games for people who want to do 5 man flexing, we are a fairly new group but want to make it crazy good for everyone to have fun in.

What We looking For in Team:

players Who Communicate and dont tilt when they start losing lane
Must have discord
Must be active And Dedicated.
silver 2++
Non Toxic


If you are interested in trialing out for the team or wanting to join the club then please add me cancer club or  Monstêr

replies.body: I'm very keen, I do have a few questions however. Firstly how many members do you already have? Which roles do you need (I main adc but can a variety of roles) and is it possible to change that name to something cooler? I look forward to hearing your response.
